June 24, 1944 D Yorkshire Championships (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Yorkshire
Championship
Academic Festival Overture
Odsal Stadium, Bradford This contest (began 1943?) was not run as an Area contest in the Nationals sequence, but the 1945 running of this event was taken as the first running of the North Eastern (later Yorkshire) area contest. Also referred to as "Yorkshire Festival".
May 1, 2011, 12:04 p.m. Oct. 30, 2014, 3:42 p.m.
